name: web-compressor
description: A gzip/deflate compressor based on De/CompressionStream buffers and base64

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:new && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run fix:default
scripts.fix:default: sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' index.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' new.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' min.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
